name: Winthrop

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Oh, well would you look at that? We got us a smoothskin visitor! Hoooeeee, we ain't seen one of your type in a long time.

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about an android from the Commonwealth?
topics.response_text: Rumors about facial surgery and reprogramming its memory. That's ancient gossip by now. Forget about it, smoothskin.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the android from the Commonwealth?
topics.response_text: A bunch of bullshit, that's all that was. Here, take this old holotape. It's just some guy pulling a clever prank. Had lots of folk convinced though.{doubting the rumors}

topics.topic_text: You know anything about the mind wipe on that escaped android?
topics.response_text: I used to this it was all so much bullshit. But then I got this holotape. Here, listen to it yourself.{bragging that he's in the know}

topics.topic_text: Got any info on an android mind wipe? Here's a 100 cap "research fee."
topics.response_text: I used to this it was all so much bullshit. But then I got this holotape. Here, listen to it yourself.{bragging that he's in the know}

topics.topic_text: You know how they rewrote engrams in a cluster of Android memory subroutines?
topics.response_text: I used to this it was all so much bullshit. But then I got this holotape. Here, listen to it yourself.{bragging that he's in the know}

topics.topic_text: Do you know who did the memory transfer on the escaped android?
topics.response_text: It was old cranky Pinkerton who did it. Over at Rivet City. One day I mean to visit him and chat him up about it.{bragging that he is in the know}

topics.topic_text: I'll give you 100 caps if you know who did the mind wipe on that android.
topics.response_text: It was old cranky Pinkerton who did it. Over at Rivet City. One day I mean to visit him and chat him up about it.{bragging that he is in the know}

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about the AI swap on that Commonwealth android?
topics.response_text: It was old cranky Pinkerton who did it. Over at Rivet City. One day I mean to visit him and chat him up about it.{bragging that he is in the know}

topics.topic_text: Damn. Another dead end. Thanks anyway.
topics.response_text: Is there anything else you need?

topics.topic: MS14CrowleyWhat can you tell me about Mister Crowley?
topics.topic_text: What do you know about Mister Crowley?
topics.response_text: Who? Never heard of him.{Confused, distracted.}

topics.topic: MS14PersuadeCrowleyCome on. You can tell me. Ahzrukhal said so. <Lie.>
topics.topic_text: Don't make me beat it out of you.
topics.response_text: Alright! Alright!

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: Meh. Not going to tell the likes of you.{doesn't think the player is worthy of the information, or can be trusted with it}

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Underworld?
topics.response_text: We were driven underground... hrm... almost fifty years ago now. Between the Super Mutants, the beasts, and you crazy humans, it's not safe up there.

topics.topic_text: Oh, you're one of those Ghouls! Just like Gob!
topics.response_text: Yeah, we're a whole city of 'em, actually... wait, you know Gob?

topics.topic_text: Smoothskin? What does that mean?
topics.response_text: Smoothskin? You know, because your skin is so smooth... and tasty...

topics.topic_text: Where am I?
topics.response_text: You're in Underworld, smoothskin. It's the only safe place for we Ghouls in D.C. We're here, out of sight and out of mind.

topics.topic_text: The Brotherhood of Steel? What's your beef with them?
topics.response_text: Bastards. They don't seem to be able to tell us apart from the Super Mutants. Or, maybe they just don't care. They see us and shoot on sight.

topics.topic_text: A city full of Ghouls, huh?
topics.response_text: That's right. And so long as you don't bother us, we won't bother you. Feel free to come and go, trade, sleep, whatever.

topics.topic_text: All right. I'm going to go have a look around.
topics.response_text: Enjoy your stay. Just... try and keep from shooting up the place.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, he's up in Megaton tending bar.
topics.response_text: Megaton! Way up there? I always did wonder what happened to that boy. When he disappeared, I just figured it was the Super Mutants what got him.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, he's in Megaton working for some jackass.
topics.response_text: You mean... he's a slave? Oh, that's terrible... even still, you should stop by Carol's Place and let his ma know that he's still alive.

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here, Winthrop?
topics.response_text: Me? I keep every hunk of old rusted pre-war garbage around here in operating condition.

topics.topic_text: Why? What's wrong?
topics.response_text: We've scavenged just about all of the scrap metal from all of the places we can safely get to.

topics.topic_text: Sure, Winthrop. I think I can help you out.
topics.response_text: Well, alright. That's good to hear, stranger. Just come on back to me when you've gathered some Scrap Metal.

topics.topic_text: Take care of your own problems.
topics.response_text: That's a shame, stranger. A real shame. Let me know if you change your mind, we'll still need the parts.

topics.topic_text: What sort of payment are we talking about?
topics.response_text: Well, we got Stimpaks, but the Doc keeps us healed up, so we don't really need 'em. So I could trade one of those for five bits of Scrap Metal.

topics.topic_text: I have a better idea. How about I do nothing and you give me what you have?
topics.response_text: What? What are you talking about? Do nothing?

topics.topic_text: Yes. As in, "I won't make a five egg omelet out of your face."
topics.response_text: You... you wouldn't dare. I've got... I mean... I'll call for help.

topics.topic_text: You'll be dead long before help gets here.
topics.response_text: Fine, Fine, you asshole. I offered you a fair trade, and this is how it is? Here, take it. Take it all and get the fuck out.

topics.topic_text: Go ahead and yell. I'll kill every last one of you.
topics.response_text: This is the last mistake you'll ever make! Help! Someone help me!

topics.topic_text: Heh. I was just kidding. Now, what were you saying about a job?
topics.response_text: You've got a strange way of joking, stranger.

topics.topic_text: This is so fascinating, I can't bear to talk about it any longer.
topics.response_text: Hey, you asked. Don't blame me if you don't like what you hear.

topics.topic_text: You wanted me to get some Scrap Metal for you, right?
topics.response_text: Oh? Have you changed your mind? Are you willing to trade some scrap?

topics.topic_text: No, I haven't changed my mind.
topics.response_text: They why are we even talking about this? I'm very busy, you know.

topics.topic_text: What were you offering to trade?
topics.response_text: I'll trade you five bits of Scrap Metal for a Stimpak, a pack of Radway, or a dose of Rad-X. Easy deal.

topics.topic_text: Yes, I've changed my mind. I'll bring you some Scrap Metal
topics.response_text: You have? Good. Excellent! We need those parts something awful. This place is falling apart.

topics.topic_text: I have some scrap metal for you.
topics.response_text: Oh, good, the vents are rattling again. I need to get up there and take care of it. What do you have?

topics.topic_text: I've got 10 bits of Scrap Metal to trade.
topics.response_text: Ten parts, eh? Alright, what do you want in trade?

topics.topic_text: I've got 15 bits of Scrap Metal to trade.
topics.response_text: Fifteen? Well, alright! A deal's a deal, so what do you want in return?

topics.topic_text: I've got 20 bits of Scrap Metal to trade.
topics.response_text: Twenty! That's great! I knew this'd work out! Just tell me what you want in return for the parts.

topics.topic_text: I've got 25 bits of Scrap Metal to trade.
topics.response_text: I didn't expect you to bring back so much! That'll set me up for quite some time. So, what'd you have in mind for payment?

topics.topic_text: I've got 5 bits of Scrap Metal to trade.
topics.response_text: Alright, sounds good. What to you want for 'em?

topics.topic_text: What was our deal again?
topics.response_text: For every five bits of Scrap Metal you give me, I'll give you a Stimpak, some RadAway, or a dose of Rad-X. I need scrap, you need goods. We both win.

topics.topic_text: Actually, never mind. I don't want to trade any Scrap Metal.
topics.response_text: Okay, then. Your call. Let me know when you do.

topics.topic_text: I'll take the RadAway.
topics.response_text: Alright, five bits of Scrap Metal for one dose of RadAway. That's a done deal.

topics.topic_text: I'll take the Stimpak.
topics.response_text: Five bits of Scrap Metal for me, one Stimpak for you  it's been a pleasure doing business.

topics.topic_text: I'll take some Rad-X.
topics.response_text: One for you, five for me. Use it in good health.

topics.topic_text: Can you repair my things?
topics.response_text: Can you pay me? Then I can repair your stuff.

conversation.response_text: Let me know if you have any of that Scrap Metal to sell!
Scrap metal is in short supply around here.
It's about Patchwork. You need to stop feeding him booze, Ahzrukhal. The boy can barely stand most of the time, and you just keep serving him.
And wouldn't it be a shame if your ventilation went down and all of your customers went to Carol's? Just think about it, Ahzrukhal.
I'm not threatening you, I'm just sayin'. No equipment. No business. Either way, my problem is solved. Think about it. We'll talk later.
No news is good news, eh, Cerberus? What about you, how are you doing?
Unit diagnostics system compiling... diagnostics system ready. Running level 2 diagnostics... complete. Report prepared.
Unit weapon system 2B ammunition level low. Please service at earliest convenience.
C'mon, I'm worried that I'm going to find you dead one of these days. Listen to yourself. You can barely talk. You're a mess, man.
Alright, I can't even talk to you about this right now. Let's just deal with it later.
No time, no time. Everything around here is always busted. Can't ever get a break.
She's dead, you damn fool robot. Thanks for reminding me.

description:
Winthrop is a 92 year-old Ghoul Male.

A middle-aged ghoul with weathered skin and tired eyes, Winthrop is the dedicated technician of Underworld. His hands are calloused from years of working on machinery and electronics. He typically wears a grease-stained jumpsuit and carries a multi-tool at his hip. Winthrop moves with a practiced efficiency, always assessing the machinery around him for potential issues.

Winthrop's Personality: Practical, methodical, and detail-oriented, Winthrop takes pride in his work and the functionality of Underworld's infrastructure. While focused on his technical duties, he's not entirely without social graces, as evidenced by his friendship with Greta. He's pragmatic about the wasteland's harsh realities but maintains a quiet determination to keep his home running smoothly.

Winthrop's Backstory: Born in 2085, Winthrop was a promising electrical engineer before the Great War. When the bombs fell in 2077, he was caught in a high-radiation zone that transformed him into a ghoul. For decades, he wandered the wasteland, using his technical skills to survive wherever he could. He eventually found his way to Underworld, a community of ghouls in the ruins of the Metro Center, where his expertise made him an invaluable technician. He's been maintaining the settlement's infrastructure for over 30 years and takes particular pride in restoring and reprogramming the robot Cerberus, which has become his most notable accomplishment.
